# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value and quality, we're considering an offer of $12,000 for it. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the high demand and limited availability of this item. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
